  • Constructor Details

    • BasicUser

      public BasicUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      An entity-level class for users that are not admins. This user can be banned, but starts out unbanned.
      Parameters:
      username - username of user.
      password - password of user.
      See Also:
      User, IBannableUser

    • BasicUser

      public BasicUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.time.LocalDateTime bannedUntil)
      Overloaded constructor to construct a entity.user.BasicUser with a custom initial ban date-time.
      Parameters:
      bannedUntil - date-time the user is banned until.

  • Method Details

    • getIsTempBanned

      public boolean getIsTempBanned()
      Check if the tempBannedUntil attribute is still in the future. If it is, the user is still banned.
      Specified by:
      getIsTempBanned in interface IBannableUser
      Returns:
      if this user is temporarily banned

    • getTempBannedUntil

      public java.time.LocalDateTime getTempBannedUntil()
      Specified by:
      getTempBannedUntil in interface IBannableUser
      Returns:
      date-time of when the user is banned until.

    • setTempBannedUntil

      public void setTempBannedUntil​(java.time.LocalDateTime bannedUntil)
      Ban the user until a specified date-time, and log the ban event.
      Specified by:
      setTempBannedUntil in interface IBannableUser
      Parameters:
      bannedUntil - date-time of when to ban the user until
